item.title: 创纪录的回调推动开市股大跌
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战至少暂时浇灭了个人投资者对美国股市的乐观情绪，在周二开盘后引发了创纪录的退市潮。【原文：President Donald Trump’s trade war at least temporarily dashed individual investors’ optimism about the US stock market, setting-off a record setting stampede for the exits just after Tuesday’s opening bell.】

item.description: 关于特朗普政府将如何执行总统的加密货币战略储备计划，华盛顿和加密货币市场充斥着许多疑问。【原文：There are many questions swirling around Washington and the crypto market regarding how exactly the Trump administration will attempt to execute on the president’s plan for a strategic cryptocurrency reserve.】

item.title: 特朗普的能源关税将引发石油流向的重新划分
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）全面征收关税，通常纵横交错的全球石油和燃料供应线即将重新划分。【原文：The world’s supply lines for cargoes of oil and fuel, which typically criss-cross the globe, are about to get redrawn thanks to US President Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs.】

item.title: X Lender Diameter 称平台利润高于市场预期
item.description: Diameter Capital Partners 是首批收购埃隆-马斯克收购 X 公司债务的公司之一，该公司的联合创始人表示，这家社交媒体公司的盈利能力超出了市场预期。【原文：The cofounder of Diameter Capital Partners, one the first firms to snap up debt tied to Elon Musk’s buyout of X, says that the social media company was more profitable than the market was accounting for.】

item.title: 股市暴跌，VIX 期货曲线发出窘迫信号
item.description: S&P 500 指数的下跌刺激了短期套期保值需求，使 Cboe VIX 期货曲线出现罕见的反转。【原文：A rout in the S&P 500 Index has boosted demand for short-term hedges, flipping the Cboe VIX Futures curve into a rare inversion.】

item.title: 纽约市财政状况不断恶化，主要指标将跌至 11 年来的最低点
item.description: 衡量纽约市财政健康状况的一项关键指标正在恶化，这加重了这座美国最大城市的财政忧虑，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府可能会削减数十亿美元的财政预算。【原文：A key measure of New York City’s fiscal health is deteriorating, adding to the largest US city’s financial worries in the face of billions of dollars in possible cuts from President Donald Trump’s administration.】

item.title: 埃利奥特提名菲利普斯 66 董事，斗争升级
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）因未能与菲利普斯 66 能源集团的领导层就改善业绩的途径达成协议，正与该公司展开代理权争夺战。【原文：Elliott Investment Management is heading toward a proxy battle with Phillips 66 after failing to reach an agreement with the energy group’s leadership on a path to improving performance.】

item.title: 调查显示美国在法投资者十年来最悲观
item.description: 根据法国美国商会和贝恩公司（Bain & Company）的一项年度调查，由于政局不稳以及预算和税收缺乏透明度，美国投资者对法国的看法是十年来最悲观的。【原文：US investors in France are the most pessimistic in a decade due to political instability as well as a lack of budget and tax visibility, according to an annual survey by the American Chamber of Commerce in France and Bain & Company.】

item.title: Blackstone 的 Gray 看涨数据中心支出
item.description: Blackstone Inc.总裁 Jon Gray 依然看好数据中心在为人工智能和日常生活提供动力方面的作用。【原文：Blackstone Inc. President Jon Gray remains bullish on the role of data centers to power artificial intelligence and daily life.】

item.title: 特朗普关税贸易 "穷途末路"，黄金价格扰动缓解
item.description: 随着实物市场紧缺状况的缓解，黄金价格的剧烈波动正在消退，这表明将金条运往美国的热潮可能已经结束。【原文：Gold’s extreme price dislocations are fading as tightness in the physical market eases, indicating a rush to ship bullion to America may have run its course.】

item.title: Blockstream 为比特币借贷基金获得数十亿美元资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，比特币开发商Blockstream公司已获得一笔数十亿美元的投资，用于推出三只基金，其中两只将用于加密借贷。【原文：Bitcoin developer Blockstream Corp. has secured a multibillion-dollar investment to launch three funds, including two that will enable crypto lending, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加密货币 "另类季 "可能在市场整体低迷中永远消失
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）连任时，加密货币从历史高点迅速回落，在此过程中，一种更可靠的交易模式似乎变得不那么可靠了。【原文：One of the more dependable trading patterns in crypto appears to have become less reliable during the swift drawdown from the all-time highs reached amid the exuberance around the re-election of Donald Trump.】

item.title: 洛杉矶火灾后预计收入短缺 1.4 亿美元
item.description: 洛杉矶市的财政收入预计将比预算低 1.4 亿美元，这也是该市连续第二年出现财政赤字。【原文：Los Angeles is estimating revenue to come in about $140 million lower than budgeted, deepening the city’s second-straight annual shortfall.】

item.title: 贸易战风险促使投资者转向其他避风港，美元下滑
item.description: 美元周二下滑，原因是对美国挑起的贸易战所带来的经济后果的担忧拉低了国债收益率，并导致股价暴跌，投资者纷纷转向海外避风港。【原文：The dollar slid Tuesday as concerns about the economic fallout of the US-sparked trade war pulled down Treasury yields and sent stock prices tumbling, driving investors into overseas havens.】

item.title: 罗伯特-鲁宾将 60 年职业生涯中最多的不确定性归咎于特朗普
item.description: 前财政部长罗伯特-鲁宾（Robert Rubin）说，唐纳德-特朗普总统的经济政策在他六十年的职业生涯中激起了 "最大的不确定性"，他警告说，这些政策将破坏信心，恶化美国的财政轨迹，并危及美国在全球舞台上的信誉。【原文：Former Treasury Secretary Robert Rubin said President Donald Trump’s economic policies have stoked the “greatest uncertainty” in his six-decade career, warning that they will undermine confidence, worsen the US fiscal trajectory and endanger US credibility on the global stage.】

item.title: 卡莱尔首席执行官施瓦茨称 "系好安全带"，特朗普关税即将生效
item.description: 凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.首席执行官哈维-施瓦茨（Harvey Schwartz）表示，在唐纳德-特朗普总统对美国最大贸易伙伴征收关税后，他预计市场波动将加剧。【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. Chief Executive Officer Harvey Schwartz said he expects increased market volatility in the wake of President Donald Trump’s tariffs on the biggest US trading partners.】

item.title: 股市持续下跌，华尔街不知道特朗普何时介入
item.description: 尽管唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易政策、持续的通胀和突然变得脆弱的经济带来了威胁，但股市交易仍接近历史记录：这就是特朗普。【原文：As stocks traded near records despite threats from President Donald Trump’s trade policies, sticky inflation and a suddenly fragile economy, strategists theorized an invisible hand was at work: Trump’s.】

item.title: 里夫斯称，特朗普的关税战将损害英国并抬高物价
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）表示，即使唐纳德-特朗普将英国排除在他对中国、加拿大和墨西哥征收的关税之外，全球贸易战也将损害英国的经济增长并推高通胀。【原文：A global trade war will damage UK growth and drive up inflation even if Donald Trump excludes Britain from the kind of tariffs he is imposing on China, Canada and Mexico, Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves said.】

item.title: 纽约证券交易所总裁马丁认为 2025 年的 IPO 市场将 "更加正常
item.description: 纽约证券交易所负责人表示，美国首次公开募股市场应该更像大流行病引发繁荣之前的几年。【原文：The market for US initial public offerings should look a lot more like the years prior to the pandemic-fueled boom, according to the head of the New York Stock Exchange.】

item.title: 基因测序公司牛津纳米孔公司受中美局势影响
item.description: 基因测序公司牛津纳米孔技术公司（Oxford Nanopore Technologies Plc）的股价创下了一年多来的最大跌幅，原因是美国研究经费削减的不确定性和全球贸易战的影响使该公司与制药业建立联系的计划黯然失色。【原文：Gene-sequencing company Oxford Nanopore Technologies Plc’s shares plunged the most in more than a year as uncertainty around cuts to US research funding and the impact of a global trade war eclipsed the firm’s plans to forge ties with the pharmaceutical industry.】

item.title: 摩根大通聘用医疗保健银行家鲍勃-韦迪埃和约翰-比沙伊
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社查阅的一份备忘录，摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is hiring a pair of health-care investment bankers as it looks to bolster its coverage of the sector, according to a memo reviewed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 特朗普关税将使加拿大陷入衰退并导致物价飞涨
item.description: 如果与最大贸易伙伴的关税战持续时间过长，加拿大经济将出现萎缩，这将是科维德-19 危机以来的首次萎缩。【原文：Canada’s economy is headed for a contraction — the first since the Covid-19 crisis — if a tariff war with its largest trading partner lasts for long.】

item.title: 美国给雪佛龙一个月时间结束在委内瑞拉的运营
item.description: 美国财政部兑现了唐纳德-特朗普总统的承诺，阻止雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）抽取和销售委内瑞拉原油，对尼古拉斯-马杜罗（Nicolas Maduro）的专制政权造成了重大打击。【原文：The U.S. Treasury followed through on President Donald Trump’s pledge to stop Chevron Corp. from pumping and selling Venezuelan crude, delivering a major blow to Nicolas Maduro’s autocratic regime.】

item.title: 航空业要求迅速升级 FAA 关键系统
item.description: 在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）力推太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）的 "星链"（Starlink）作为现代化解决方案之际，航空业团体和工会领导人呼吁联邦航空管理局加快升级关键的空中交通管制系统。【原文：Aviation industry groups and union leaders called on the Federal Aviation Administration to expedite upgrades to critical air-traffic control systems, as Elon Musk pushes SpaceX’s Starlink as a solution for modernization.】

item.title: 让我们谈谈特朗普悖论
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 特朗普的关税为何会推高美国汽油价格？
item.description: 美国人喜欢开车，也喜欢廉价驾驶，但新近对从加拿大和墨西哥进口的石油征收的关税可能会提高美国各地的汽油价格，并让负责生产燃料的炼油厂头疼不已。【原文：Americans love driving and doing so on the cheap, but newly imposed tariffs on oil imported from Canada and Mexico are likely to raise gasoline prices around the US and cause headaches for the refiners responsible for making the fuel.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰与高尔夫球手桑德尔-肖夫勒签订赞助协议
item.description: 资产管理公司 Blue Owl Capital 与世界最优秀的高尔夫球手之一桑德-肖费尔（Xander Schauffele）签订了一份多年的形象大使合约。【原文：Asset manager Blue Owl Capital has signed a multi-year ambassador deal with Xander Schauffele, one of the world’s best golfers.】

item.title: 美国股市因关税打击而抹去特朗普 3.4 万亿美元涨势
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫是华尔街庆祝的理由。仅在大选日后的一个月内，S&P 500 指数就跃升了 5%以上，价值增加了约 2.8 万亿美元，因为人们预期新政府将为经济注入活力。【原文：Donald Trump’s return to the White House was cause for celebration on Wall Street. In the month after Election Day alone, the S&P 500 Index jumped more than 5%, adding some $2.8 trillion in value, on the expectation that the new administration would juice the economy.】
